name: Claustrophobia Remake
description:
This is a remake of a game that I made a long time ago and lost so I thought why not remake it it'll be a fun side project.

The goal of the game is to reach the money in the attic. The gimmick of the game is that each screen shows what you'll be facing later on with the second floor so there's 2 "stages" per screen but you only have access to the one you're on.
